teaser: Marketplace catches up with Jack Dorsey on life post-Twitter.
description: Marketplace catches up with Jack Dorsey on life post-Twitter.
contentencoded: Jack Dorsey, CEO of Square and co-founder of Twitter, sits down with Marketplace's Kai Ryssdal to discuss Square, his life since Twitter and what the future holds for a visionary that many have called “the next Steve Jobs.”
contenttemplated:
[{"type":"text/html","content":"

Jack Dorsey, CEO of Square and co-founder of Twitter, sits down with Marketplace's Kai Ryssdal to discuss Square, his life since Twitter and what the future holds for a visionary that many have called “the next Steve Jobs.”

"}]
title: Jack Dorsey of Square on what he's learned as CEO
